name: Last Mob Standing
description:
Controls: The controls are straightforward and only use the mouse.

Attack = Left Mouse Button | A slow attack that will instantly kill any enemy

Block = Hold Right Mouse Button | Hold to spin your scythe, creating a shield that will reduce damage taken and reflect projectiles.

Move = Tap Right Mouse Button | This one is self-explanatory, click anywhere to move to that location.

Balance: As a magically animated scarecrow you have no concept of "health", but, since losing your arm and leg, you find yourself off balance and easily exposed to a killing blow.  Watch the balance gauge in the upper right hand side of the screen, attacking, blocking, and getting hit drain your balance gauge, it regenerates over time while standing or moving, if it hits zero, you become vulnerable to the next enemy attack which will kill you.

Goal: Kill as many enemies as you can.
